mapper.select: select dd.id, dict_type_id, dict_code, dict_value, dd.remark from sys_dict_data dd left join sys_dict_type dt on dd.dict_type_id = dt.id where dt.type_code = #{typeCode} order by dd.dict_code
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_dict_data (dict_type_id, dict_code, dict_value, remark) values (#{dictTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
